election_record.label: Connecticut 1823 U.S. House of Representatives

sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Fairfield.

sub_unit.note: Ansel Sterling received 14 votes as Anson Sterling.

sub_unit.note: Ansel Sterling received 30 votes as Anson Sterling.
